bibl.title: Two Greek Wartetexte from the Cambridge Genizah Collection.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.title: Korufa€ƒ éndr€. Mélanges offerts à André Hurst
bibl.author: TCHERNETSKA, Natalie

bibl.note: Cambrige University Library, Taylor-Schechter Collection, Inv. 12.185 and AS.78.411. Two parchment scraps with upper texts in Hebrew and lower texts in Greek (respectively written in "Alexandrian" and "Biblical majuscule", assigned to the 6th-7th and late 5th-6th centuries). Diplomatic transcription of the Greek texts (possibly copied in Egypt); their contents defied all identification so far.
